pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Frontegg Pulumi ProviderA [Pulumi](https://pulumi.com) provider for the [Frontegg] user managementplatform.## UsageI haven't figured out how to automatically generate Pulumi documentation yet.So, for now, you'll have to take a look at the Terraform documentation andfollow the usual Terraformâ€“Pulumi conversion rules:<https://registry.terraform.io/providers/frontegg/frontegg/latest/docs>[Frontegg]: https://frontegg.com
